MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch, affecting properties in Ivanhoe Drive and surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair on an underground cable located outside 67 Ivanhoe Drive we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.30am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.04am on Tuesday 16th February 2021.
